Pre-Game Insights: The Windies directly qualified for the World Cup as one of the hosts while PNG went unbeaten in qualifying for the event.
One of the most in-form teams ahead of the T20 World Cup, Papua New Guinea will hope to register a few positive results in this World Cup.
Tony Ura has been the backbone of their squad and Charles Amini will be crucial as the main spinner.
The Windies may struggle on the bowling front due to the inexperience of their bowlers.
